jp.cost: Varies by service. Pacific League TV is about ¥1,900/month, DAZN is ¥1,750/month
jp.restrictions: Some games may be blacked out depending on the service
jp.additionalInfo: Pacific League TV covers Pacific League games. DAZN, NHK, and J SPORTS broadcast select games from both leagues.

us.restrictions: Only Pacific League games are available
us.additionalInfo: Limited availability of NPB games in the US. Some games may be available through specialized Asian sports packages on cable/satellite providers.

kr.additionalInfo: SPOTV occasionally broadcasts NPB games, particularly those featuring Korean players.

tw.additionalInfo: Videoland occasionally broadcasts NPB games, particularly those featuring Taiwanese players.

cn.additionalInfo: Tencent occasionally broadcasts NPB games, but availability may vary.

global.cost: About ¥2,200/month for Pacific League TV (price may vary by region)
global.restrictions: Only Pacific League games are available
global.additionalInfo: Pacific League TV is available globally, but commentary is in Japanese. Central League games are generally not available for international streaming.
